article_title: U.S. Government Bonds Rally on Tame Wage Inflation
article_text:
U.S. government bonds strengthened on Friday as the latest sign of stagnant wage growth bolstered expectations that the Federal Reserve will be patient in raising interest rates.

Friday’s bond-price strength capped a rally during the first full week of trading in 2015, with the yield on the benchmark 10-year note falling below 2% for the first...
